name: FireDepartmentTrivia
0:
”Alexa, ask Fire Department Trivia for Backdraft trivia”
”Emergency trivia”
”Play siren”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fire department trivia
des: With Fire Department Trivia you can ask Alexa about the show Emergency which aired on NBC in the 1970s and the popular movie Backdraft. And, if you have kids, you can ask Fire Department Trivia to play a siren. Have fun and, if you're a firefighter, be safe!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
